      • clean

        public void clean()
        Description copied from interface: Cleanable
        Allows the implementer to perform any necessary cleanup tasks. For most engine-specific resources, this method should not be called manually as it is usually always called after stop() has been called.
        Specified by:
        clean in interface Cleanable

      • getRegistryId

        public java.lang.String getRegistryId()
        Description copied from interface: Indexable
        Returns the registry ID to use in the Registry. This ID must be unique within the registry.
